      • colorBetween

        public static java.awt.Color colorBetween(java.awt.Color min,
                          java.awt.Color max,
                          double weight,
                          int alpha)
        Returns a color "between" min and max, corresponding to the given weight. If the weight is 0.0 then the method returns min color, if it's 1.0 then the max color, otherwise something in between.
        Parameters:
        weight - Between 0.0 and 1.0
